data.eml:eml: Record of Natula matsuurai Sugimoto (Orthoptera: Gryllidae: Trigonidiinae) and other sword-tailed crickets from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mal, Jhabar, Nagar, Rajendra, Swaminathan, R. (2014): Record of Natula matsuurai Sugimoto (Orthoptera: Gryllidae: Trigonidiinae) and other sword-tailed crickets from India. Zootaxa 3760 (3): 458-462, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.3.12
